vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
οὗ,
genitive of relative and possess. Prons. ὅς: as adverb where, see at {ὅς}, ἥ, ὅ A b. 1.
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
where; to which
where, in what place, Mt. 2:9; 18:20; whither, to what place, to which Lk. 10:1; 22:10; 24:28; οὗ ἐάν, whithersoever, 1Cor. 16:6
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ở nơi mà; ở đâu; ở chổ nào. Xem ὅς (G3739)
